survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Remote Work Cybersecurity Training Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and effectiveness of cybersecurity training provided for remote work environments.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in remote work cybersecurity training sessions?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for better clarity on response frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in remote work cybersecurity training sessions?

questions.question_text: Which topics in the cybersecurity training do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which topics in the cybersecurity training do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' in Q1

questions.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the cybersecurity training in preparing you for remote work threats?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better assessment of training effectiveness.

script.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the cybersecurity training in preparing you for remote work threats?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the cybersecurity training sessions?
